snippet: Critics say a provision of the Advanced Clean Cars Program could allow automakers to sell fewer environmentally desirable cars in California in coming years.
lead_paragraph: Critics say a provision of the Advanced Clean Cars Program could allow automakers to sell fewer environmentally desirable cars in California in coming years.

headline.seo: California Clean Cars Deal Criticized as Hurting Green Sales
headline.main: California Car Deal Criticized as Hurting Green Sales
headline.print_headline: Car Deal Criticized As Hurting Green Sales
